name: Filtering Post
author: Eric Zeidan

sections.description:
A filtering Plugin to show contents per category nicely with an effect like isotope or filterizr

Major features in Filtering Posts include:

  • Creation of more than one view.
  • Filtering per category.
  • Uses generated Shortcodes to display the post contents wherever you want to.
  • Includes a search box for filtering
  • You can select between use the post thumbnail, the content or the title of the post
  • A default image can be set in case post has no image, otherwise a no-image pic will be show
  • Possibility to select screen-options like same width, same height or both.
sections.installation:
Upload the Filtering Post plugin to your blog, Activate it, begin to create the views, put the Shortcodes.

1, 2, 3: You’re done!
